summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to cancel the unpaid assessments levied for the improvement of 42nd Avenue South, et al., Local Improvement District No. 3180, by trunk sewer, and the unpaid assessments levied for the improvement of Eddy Street, et al, Local Improvement District No 3605, by sewers, on certain property which has been deeded to the City of Seattle for street purposes.
